chorus.translation[0].definitions[0].def: the part of a song that is repeated after each verse
chorus.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a large group of people who sing together
chorus.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: I sing with the university chorus.
chorus.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a piece of music written to be sung by a large group of people
chorus.translation[0].definitions[3].def: a group of singers, dancers, or actors who act together in a show but do not have the main parts
chorus.translation[0].definitions[3].exa: New voices are needed to join the chorus for the annual festival in October.
chorus.translation[1].definitions[0].def: if people chorus something, they say it at the same time
